00039 #define HT_DEBUG_ATTR(_txn_, _fn_, _an_, _k_, _v_) \
00040   HT_DEBUG_OUT <<"txn="<< (_txn_) <<" fname='"<< (_fn_) <<"' attr='"<< (_an_) \
00041       <<"' key='"<< (char *)(_k_).get_data() <<"' value='"<< (_v_) <<"'" \
00042       << HT_END
00043 
00044 #define HT_DEBUG_ATTR_(_txn_, _fn_, _an_, _k_, _v_, _l_) \
00045   HT_DEBUG_OUT <<"txn="<< (_txn_) <<" fname='"<< (_fn_); \
00046   if ((_an_) == "n/a") _out_ <<"' attr='"<< (_an_); \
00047   _out_ <<"' key='" << (char *)(_k_).get_data(); \
00048   if (_l_) _out_ <<"' value='"<< HT_HEAD_(_v_, _l_, 10); \
00049   _out_ <<"'"<< HT_END

00053 BerkeleyDbFilesystem::BerkeleyDbFilesystem(const std::string &basedir,
00054                                            bool force_recover)
00055     : m_base_dir(basedir), m_env(0) {
00056   DbTxn *txn = NULL;
00057 
00058   u_int32_t env_flags =
00059     DB_CREATE |      // If the environment does not exist, create it
00060     DB_INIT_LOCK  |  // Initialize locking
00061     DB_INIT_LOG   |  // Initialize logging
00062     DB_INIT_MPOOL |  // Initialize the cache
00063     DB_INIT_TXN   |  // Initialize transactions
00064     DB_RECOVER    |  // Do basic recovery
00065     DB_THREAD;
00066 
00067   if (force_recover)
00068     env_flags |= DB_RECOVER_FATAL;
00069 
00070   u_int32_t db_flags = DB_CREATE | DB_AUTO_COMMIT | DB_THREAD;
00071 
00075   try {
00076     int ret;
00077     Dbt key, data;
00078 
00079     m_env.set_lk_detect(DB_LOCK_DEFAULT);
00080 
00081     m_env.open(m_base_dir.c_str(), env_flags, 0);
00082     m_db = new Db(&m_env, 0);
00083     m_db->open(NULL, "namespace.db", NULL, DB_BTREE, db_flags, 0);
00084 
00085     txn = start_transaction();
00086 
00087     key.set_data((void *)"/");
00088     key.set_size(2);
00089 
00090     data.set_flags(DB_DBT_REALLOC);
00091 
00092     if ((ret = m_db->get(txn, &key, &data, 0)) == DB_NOTFOUND) {
00093       data.set_data(0);
00094       data.set_size(0);
00095       ret = m_db->put(txn, &key, &data, 0);
00096       key.set_data((void *)"/hyperspace/");
00097       key.set_size(strlen("/hyperspace/")+1);
00098       ret = m_db->put(txn, &key, &data, 0);
00099       key.set_data((void *)"/hyperspace/metadata");
00100       key.set_size(strlen("/hyperspace/metadata")+1);
00101       ret = m_db->put(txn, &key, &data, 0);
00102     }
00103     if (data.get_data() != 0)
00104       free(data.get_data());
00105     txn->commit(0);
00106 
00107   }
00108   catch(DbException &e) {
00109     txn->abort();
00110     HT_FATALF("Error initializing Berkeley DB (dir=%s) - %s",
00111               m_base_dir.c_str(), e.what());
00112   }
00113   HT_DEBUG_OUT <<"namespace initialized"<< HT_END;
00114 }

00119 BerkeleyDbFilesystem::~BerkeleyDbFilesystem() {
00123   try {
00124     m_db->close(0);
00125     delete m_db;
00126     m_env.close(0);
00127   }
00128   catch(DbException &e) {
00129     HT_ERRORF("Error closing Berkeley DB (dir=%s) - %s",
00130               m_base_dir.c_str(), e.what());
00131   }
00132   HT_DEBUG_OUT <<"namespace closed"<< HT_END;
00133 }

00135 
00136 DbTxn *BerkeleyDbFilesystem::start_transaction() {
00137   DbTxn *txn = NULL;
00138 
00139   // begin transaction
00140   try {
00141     m_env.txn_begin(NULL, &txn, DB_READ_COMMITTED);
00142   }
00143   catch (DbException &e) {
00144     HT_FATALF("Error starting Berkeley DB transaction: %s", e.what());
00145   }
00146   HT_DEBUG_OUT <<"txn="<< txn << HT_END;
00147 
00148   return txn;
00149 }

00154 bool
00155 BerkeleyDbFilesystem::get_xattr_i32(DbTxn *txn, const String &fname,
00156     const String &aname, uint32_t *valuep) {
00157   int ret;
00158   Dbt key;
00159   DbtManaged data;
00160   String keystr = fname;
00161 
00162   build_attr_key(txn, keystr, aname, key);
00163 
00164   try {
00165     if ((ret = m_db->get(txn, &key, &data, 0)) == 0) {
00166       const uint8_t *ptr = (uint8_t *)data.get_data();
00167       size_t remaining = data.get_size();
00168       *valuep = Serialization::decode_i32(&ptr, &remaining);
00169       HT_DEBUG_ATTR(txn, fname, aname, key, *valuep);
00170       return true;
00171     }
00172   }
00173   catch (DbException &e) {
00174     HT_ERRORF("Berkeley DB error: %s", e.what());
00175     HT_THROW(HYPERSPACE_BERKELEYDB_ERROR, e.what());
00176   }
00177 
00178   return false;
00179 }

00185 void
00186 BerkeleyDbFilesystem::set_xattr_i32(DbTxn *txn, const String &fname,
00187                                     const String &aname, uint32_t value) {
00188   int ret;
00189   Dbt key, data;
00190   uint32_t uval;
00191   String keystr = fname;
00192 
00193   build_attr_key(txn, keystr, aname, key);
00194 
00195   uint8_t *ptr = (uint8_t *)&uval;
00196   Serialization::encode_i32(&ptr, value);
00197 
00198   data.set_data(&uval);
00199   data.set_size(4);
00200 
00201   try {
00202     ret = m_db->put(txn, &key, &data, 0);
00203     HT_DEBUG_ATTR(txn, fname, aname, key, value);
00204   }
00205   catch (DbException &e) {
00206     HT_ERRORF("Berkeley DB error: %s", e.what());
00207     HT_THROW(HYPERSPACE_BERKELEYDB_ERROR, e.what());
00208   }
00209 
00210   HT_EXPECT(ret == 0, HYPERSPACE_BERKELEYDB_ERROR);
00211 }

00280     const String &aname, const void *value, size_t value_len) {

00304 bool
00305 BerkeleyDbFilesystem::get_xattr(DbTxn *txn, const String &fname,
00306                                 const String &aname, DynamicBuffer &vbuf) {
00307   int ret;
00308   Dbt key;
00309   DbtManaged data;
00310   String keystr = fname;
00311 
00312   build_attr_key(txn, keystr, aname, key);
00313 
00314   try {
00315     if ((ret = m_db->get(txn, &key, &data, 0)) == 0) {
00316       vbuf.reserve(data.get_size());
00317       memcpy(vbuf.base, (uint8_t *)data.get_data(), data.get_size());
00318       vbuf.ptr += data.get_size();
00319       HT_DEBUG_ATTR_(txn, fname, aname, key, vbuf.base, data.get_size());
00320       return true;
00321     }
00322   }
00323   catch (DbException &e) {
00324     HT_ERRORF("Berkeley DB error: %s", e.what());
00325     HT_THROW(HYPERSPACE_BERKELEYDB_ERROR, e.what());
00326   }
00327 
00328   return false;
00329 }

00332 void
00333 BerkeleyDbFilesystem::del_xattr(DbTxn *txn, const String &fname,
00334                                 const String &aname) {
00335   int ret;
00336   Dbt key;
00337   String keystr = fname;
00338 
00339   build_attr_key(txn, keystr, aname, key);
00340 
00341   try {
00342     if ((ret = m_db->del(txn, &key, 0)) == DB_NOTFOUND)
00343       HT_THROW(HYPERSPACE_ATTR_NOT_FOUND, aname);
00344     HT_DEBUG_ATTR_(txn, fname, aname, key, "", 0);
00345   }
00346   catch (DbException &e) {
00347     HT_ERRORF("Berkeley DB error: %s", e.what());
00348     HT_THROW(HYPERSPACE_BERKELEYDB_ERROR, e.what());
00349   }
00350 }

00355 void BerkeleyDbFilesystem::mkdir(DbTxn *txn, const String &name) {
00356   int ret;
00357   Dbt key;
00358   DbtManaged data;
00359   size_t lastslash = name.rfind('/', name.length()-1);
00360   String dirname = name.substr(0, lastslash+1);
00361 
00362   try {
00366     key.set_data((void *)dirname.c_str());
00367     key.set_size(dirname.length()+1);
00368 
00369     if ((ret = m_db->get(txn, &key, &data, 0)) == DB_NOTFOUND)
00370       HT_THROW(HYPERSPACE_FILE_NOT_FOUND, dirname);
00371 
00372     // formulate directory name
00373     dirname = name;
00374     if (dirname[dirname.length()-1] != '/')
00375       dirname += "/";
00376 
00377     HT_DEBUG_OUT <<"dirname='"<< dirname <<"'"<< HT_END;
00378 
00382     key.set_data((void *)dirname.c_str());
00383     key.set_size(dirname.length()+1);
00384 
00385     if ((ret = m_db->get(txn, &key, &data, 0)) != DB_NOTFOUND)
00386       HT_THROW(HYPERSPACE_FILE_EXISTS, dirname);
00387 
00391     key.set_data((void *)dirname.c_str());
00392     key.set_size(dirname.length()+1);
00393 
00394     data.clear();
00395 
00396     ret = m_db->put(txn, &key, &data, 0);
00397 
00398   }
00399   catch (DbException &e) {
00400     HT_ERRORF("Berkeley DB error: %s", e.what());
00401     HT_THROW(HYPERSPACE_BERKELEYDB_ERROR, e.what());
00402   }
00403 }

00405 
00406 void BerkeleyDbFilesystem::unlink(DbTxn *txn, const String &name) {
00407   std::vector<String> delkeys;
00408   DbtManaged keym, datam;
00409   Dbt key;
00410   Dbc *cursorp = 0;
00411   bool looks_like_dir = false;
00412   bool looks_like_file = false;
00413   String str;
00414 
00415   try {
00416     m_db->cursor(txn, &cursorp, 0);
00417 
00418     keym.set_str(name);
00419 
00420     if (cursorp->get(&keym, &datam, DB_SET_RANGE) != DB_NOTFOUND) {
00421       do {
00422         str = keym.get_str();
00423 
00424         if (str.length() > name.length()) {
00425           if (str[name.length()] == '/') {
00426             if (str.length() > name.length()+1 && str[name.length()+1] != ':') {
00427               cursorp->close();
00428               HT_THROW(HYPERSPACE_DIR_NOT_EMPTY, name);
00429             }
00430             looks_like_dir = true;
00431             delkeys.push_back(keym.get_str());
00432           }
00433           else if (str[name.length()] == ':') {
00434             looks_like_file = true;
00435             delkeys.push_back(keym.get_str());
00436           }
00437         }
00438         else {
00439           delkeys.push_back(keym.get_str());
00440           looks_like_file = true;
00441         }
00442 
00443       } while (cursorp->get(&keym, &datam, DB_NEXT) != DB_NOTFOUND &&
00444                starts_with(keym.get_str(), name.c_str()));
00445     }
00446 
00447     cursorp->close();
00448     cursorp = 0;
00449 
00450     HT_EXPECT(!(looks_like_dir && looks_like_file), FAILED_EXPECTATION);
00451 
00452     if (delkeys.empty())
00453       HT_THROW(HYPERSPACE_FILE_NOT_FOUND, name);
00454 
00455     for (size_t i=0; i<delkeys.size(); i++) {
00456       key.set_data((void *)delkeys[i].c_str());
00457       key.set_size(delkeys[i].length()+1);
00458       HT_EXPECT(m_db->del(txn, &key, 0) != DB_NOTFOUND, FAILED_EXPECTATION);
00459       HT_DEBUG_ATTR_(txn, name, "n/a", key, "", 0);
00460     }
00461   }
00462   catch (DbException &e) {
00463     HT_ERRORF("Berkeley DB error: %s", e.what());
00464     if (cursorp)
00465       cursorp->close();
00466     HT_THROW(HYPERSPACE_BERKELEYDB_ERROR, e.what());
00467   }
00468 }

00471 bool
00472 BerkeleyDbFilesystem::exists(DbTxn *txn, String fname, bool *is_dir_p) {
00473   int ret;
00474   Dbt key;
00475 
00476   if (is_dir_p)
00477     *is_dir_p = false;
00478 
00479   key.set_data((void *)fname.c_str());
00480   key.set_size(fname.length()+1);
00481 
00482   try {
00483     if ((ret = m_db->exists(txn, &key, 0)) == DB_NOTFOUND) {
00484       fname += "/";
00485       key.set_data((void *)fname.c_str());
00486       key.set_size(fname.length()+1);
00487 
00488       if ((ret = m_db->exists(txn, &key, 0)) == DB_NOTFOUND) {
00489         HT_DEBUG_OUT <<"'"<< fname <<"' does NOT exist."<< HT_END;
00490         return false;
00491       }
00492       if (is_dir_p)
00493         *is_dir_p = true;
00494     }
00495   }
00496   catch (DbException &e) {
00497     HT_ERRORF("Berkeley DB error: %s", e.what());
00498     HT_THROW(HYPERSPACE_BERKELEYDB_ERROR, e.what());
00499   }
00500 
00501   HT_DEBUG_OUT <<"'"<< fname <<"' exists."<< HT_END;
00502   return true;
00503 }

00505 
00509 void
00510 BerkeleyDbFilesystem::create(DbTxn *txn, const String &fname, bool temp) {
00511   int ret;
00512   Dbt key;
00513   DbtManaged data;
00514 
00515   HT_DEBUG_OUT <<"txn="<< txn <<" fname='"<< fname <<"' temp="<< temp << HT_END;
00516 
00517   try {
00518     if (exists(txn, fname, 0))
00519       HT_THROW(HYPERSPACE_FILE_EXISTS, fname);
00520 
00521     if (ends_with(fname, "/"))
00522       HT_THROW(HYPERSPACE_IS_DIRECTORY, fname);
00523 
00524     size_t lastslash = fname.rfind('/', fname.length() - 1);
00525     String parent_dir = fname.substr(0, lastslash + 1);
00526 
00527     key.set_data((void *)parent_dir.c_str());
00528     key.set_size(parent_dir.length()+1);
00529 
00530     if ((ret = m_db->get(txn, &key, &data, 0)) == DB_NOTFOUND)
00531       HT_THROW(HYPERSPACE_BAD_PATHNAME, fname);
00532 
00533     key.set_data((void *)fname.c_str());
00534     key.set_size(fname.length()+1);
00535 
00536     ret = m_db->put(txn, &key, &data, 0);
00537 
00538     if (temp) {
00539       String temp_key = fname + ":temp";
00540       key.set_data((void *)temp_key.c_str());
00541       key.set_size(temp_key.length()+1);
00542       ret = m_db->put(txn, &key, &data, 0);
00543     }
00544   }
00545   catch (DbException &e) {
00546     HT_ERRORF("Berkeley DB error: %s", e.what());
00547     HT_THROW(HYPERSPACE_BERKELEYDB_ERROR, e.what());
00548   }
00549 }

00551 
00552 void
00553 BerkeleyDbFilesystem::get_directory_listing(DbTxn *txn, String fname,
00554                                             std::vector<DirEntry> &listing) {
00555   DbtManaged keym, datam;
00556   Dbt key;
00557   Dbc *cursorp = 0;
00558   String str, last_str;
00559   DirEntry entry;
00560   size_t offset;
00561 
00562   try {
00563     m_db->cursor(txn, &cursorp, 0);
00564 
00565     if (!ends_with(fname, "/"))
00566       fname += "/";
00567 
00568     HT_DEBUG_OUT <<"txn="<< txn <<" dir='"<< fname <<"'"<< HT_END;
00569     keym.set_str(fname);
00570 
00571     if (cursorp->get(&keym, &datam, DB_SET_RANGE) != DB_NOTFOUND) {
00572 
00573       if (!starts_with(keym.get_str(), fname.c_str())) {
00574         cursorp->close();
00575         HT_THROW(HYPERSPACE_BAD_PATHNAME, fname);
00576       }
00577 
00578       do {
00579         str = keym.get_str();
00580 
00581         if (str.length() > fname.length()) {
00582           if (str[fname.length()] != ':') {
00583             str = str.substr(fname.length());
00584 
00585             if ((offset = str.find('/')) != String::npos) {
00586               entry.name = str.substr(0, offset);
00587 
00588               if (entry.name != last_str) {
00589                 entry.is_dir = true;
00590                 listing.push_back(entry);
00591                 last_str = entry.name;
00592               }
00593             }
00594             else {
00595               if ((offset = str.find(':')) != String::npos) {
00596                 entry.name = str.substr(0, offset);
00597 
00598                 if (entry.name != last_str) {
00599                   entry.is_dir = false;
00600                   listing.push_back(entry);
00601                   last_str = entry.name;
00602                 }
00603               }
00604               else {
00605                 entry.name = str;
00606 
00607                 if (entry.name != last_str) {
00608                   entry.is_dir = false;
00609                   listing.push_back(entry);
00610                   last_str = entry.name;
00611                 }
00612               }
00613             }
00614           }
00615         }
00616       } while (cursorp->get(&keym, &datam, DB_NEXT) != DB_NOTFOUND &&
00617                starts_with(keym.get_str(), fname.c_str()));
00618 
00619     }
00620 
00621     cursorp->close();
00622     cursorp = 0;
00623 
00624   }
00625   catch (DbException &e) {
00626     HT_ERRORF("Berkeley DB error: %s", e.what());
00627     if (cursorp)
00628       cursorp->close();
00629     HT_THROW(HYPERSPACE_BERKELEYDB_ERROR, e.what());
00630   }
00631 }

00633 
00634 void
00635 BerkeleyDbFilesystem::get_all_names(DbTxn *txn,
00636                                     std::vector<String> &names) {
00637   DbtManaged keym, datam;
00638   Dbc *cursorp = NULL;
00639   int ret;
00640 
00641   HT_DEBUG_OUT <<"txn="<< txn << HT_END;
00642 
00643   try {
00644     m_db->cursor(txn, &cursorp, 0);
00645 
00646     while ((ret = cursorp->get(&keym, &datam, DB_NEXT)) == 0) {
00647       names.push_back(keym.get_str());
00648     }
00649   }
00650   catch(DbException &e) {
00651     HT_FATALF("Berkeley DB error: %s", e.what());
00652   }
00653   catch(std::exception &e) {
00654     HT_FATALF("Berkeley DB error: %s", e.what());
00655   }
00656 
00657   if (cursorp != NULL)
00658     cursorp->close();
00659 }
00660 
00661 void
00662 BerkeleyDbFilesystem::build_attr_key(DbTxn *txn, String &keystr,
00663                                      const String &aname, Dbt &key) {
00664   bool isdir;
00665 
00666   if (!exists(txn, keystr, &isdir))
00667     HT_THROW(HYPERSPACE_FILE_NOT_FOUND, keystr);
00668 
00669   if (isdir)
00670     keystr += "/";
00671 
00672   keystr += ":";
00673   keystr += aname;
00674 
00675   key.set_data((void *)keystr.c_str());
00676   key.set_size(keystr.length() + 1);
00677 }
